name: Corpses, Plants & Skyvikings
description:
Kill, Compost, Grow, Defend!

"Corpses, Plants & Skyvikings" is a game made for the Kindred Community. 

Your goal is to defend yourself from the attacks of Skyvikings.

You compost the corpses of your enemies to plant trees and build defenses from your gathered materials!

Every interaction with your, plants, buildings and enemies is shooting them with the right thing: Ground with earth, earth with seeds, composter with flesh and enemies with bullets.

Enjoy macabre gardening and building in this tower-defense gardening FPS.
